footnotes.english_saheeh: [1967]- i.e., the horses of those fighting for Allāh's cause as they race to attack the enemy.

translations.english_hilali_khan: By the (steeds) that run, with panting.

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1968]- Their hoofs while galloping over rocky terrain.

translations.english_saheeh: And the producers of sparks [when] striking[1968]
translations.english_hilali_khan: Striking sparks of fire (by their hooves).
translations.english_rwwad: striking sparks of fire [with their hooves],

translations.english_hilali_khan: And scouring to the raid at dawn.
And raise the dust in clouds the while.
translations.english_rwwad: stirring up thereby clouds of dust,

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1970]- i.e., penetrating into the enemy ranks during a surprise attack.

translations.english_saheeh: Arriving thereby in the center[1970] collectively,
translations.english_hilali_khan: And penetrating forthwith as one into the midst (of the foe).
translations.english_rwwad: plunging thereby into the midst of the enemy,

translations.english_saheeh: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
translations.english_hilali_khan: Verily, man (disbeliever) is ungrateful to his Lord.
translations.english_rwwad: indeed, man is very ungrateful to his Lord –

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1971]- Through his speech and his actions.

translations.english_saheeh: And indeed, he is to that a witness.[1971]
translations.english_hilali_khan: And to that he bears witness (by his deeds).
translations.english_rwwad: and he himself is a witness to that –

translations.english_saheeh: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
translations.english_hilali_khan: And verily, he is violent in the love of wealth.
translations.english_rwwad: and he is truly extreme in his love of wealth.

arabic_text: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

translations.english_saheeh: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
translations.english_hilali_khan: Knows he not that when the contents of the graves are poured forth (all mankind is resurrected)?
translations.english_rwwad: Does he not know that the contents of graves will be overturned,

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1972]- i.e., when all secrets are made known.

translations.english_saheeh: And that within the breasts is obtained,[1972]
translations.english_hilali_khan: And that which is in the breasts (of men) is made known?
translations.english_rwwad: and the secrets of the hearts will be brought to light?

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1973]- Fully acquainted and familiar with everything about each one of them.

translations.english_saheeh: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Aware.[1973]
translations.english_hilali_khan: Verily, that Day (i.e. the Day of Resurrection) their Lord will be Well-Acquainted with them (as to their deeds and will reward them for their deeds).
translations.english_rwwad: Indeed, their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day.
